name: Cut Out Sugar Cookies and Frosting
steps: Cream shortening and sugar, then add eggs one at a time. Add sour cream and vanilla. Sift dry ingredients together and
add to the creamed mixture. Roll on floured canvas adding more flour to get the right consistency for cookies.
Cut the cookies fairlythick. Bake at 350 for 10-­‐12 minutes. Cookies should not be brown when they come out of the oven.
Wait for the cookies to cool, then frost them and add sprinkles.
